tool_description: (Beta) Public preview of Anti-phishing scam API, PhishyScan, powered by OpenAI.
name: PhishyScan API
title: PhishyScan API

api_list.name: Scan
api_list.description: Scan an email message for signs of phishing.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://phishyscan-api.p.rapidapi.com/scan"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "phishyscan-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://phishyscan-api.p.rapidapi.com/scan"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "phishyscan-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
